channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: In the Night Garden
channel.desc: Where's Upsy Daisy Gone? Series for young children. Upsy Daisy teaches Igglepiggle how to play hiding. Upsy Daisy is very good at hiding. Igglepiggle is impressed.

channel.title: CBeebies Bedtime Stories
channel.desc: Floella Benjamin - Hiding Heidi. Floella Benjamin reads a story about a girl who is great at hide-and-seek.
